settings.title: Meraki Ã— Five Elephant
settings.description:
Based in Berlin, Germany, and known for their clean, balanced roast profiles, Five Elephant is deeply committed to ethical sourcing and long-term producer relationships. They work closely with farmers who care for the land, support their communities, and invest in the future of coffee. From soil health and shade-grown cultivation to clean water access and educational programs, their approach is rooted in real impact.

Five Elephant doesnâ€™t follow trends or rely on greenwashing. Their focus is on transparency, traceability, and building meaningful, lasting relationships. Itâ€™s the kind of integrity that resonates deeply with our own values at Meraki.

Many of their producer relationships span years, and that shows in every cup. When you taste Fiveâ€¯Elephant, youâ€™re sipping a story rooted in care, accountability, and quietly refined quality.

Thatâ€™s why we feature Five Elephant in the CoffeeSenseâ„¢ program. Their coffees brew beautifully on Meraki machines and represent the kind of values we genuinely stand for.
